header.really-delete-account: Do you really want to irrevocably delete your account with the associated sessions?
header.account-deleted: Your account has been deleted successfully.

home-page.no-room-found: No session found with this ID
home-page.exactly-8: A session ID has exactly 8 digits.
home-page.only-numbers: A session ID only contains digits.
home-page.accessibility-join: Join button. Enters the room with the specified session ID.
home-page.accessibility-create: Create button. Creates a new session

login.guest-login-tooltip: Created sessions will be deleted after logout.
login.login-tooltip: Sessions will be stored for 180 days.

password-reset.reset-successful: Password was reset. Please check your mails.

register.register-successful: Successfully registered. Please check your mails.
register.register-request-error: Something went wrong with the registration. Maybe you already made the account?

footer.will-open: will be opened in a new tab...
footer.beamer: Optimized for the projector (work in progress)
footer.wai: Accessible according to WCAG 2.1 (work in progress)
footer.accessibility-demo: Demo-Button. Opens a window with a demo video
footer.accessibility-data_protection: Data-Protection-Button. Displays link to the arsnova privacy statement
footer.accessibility-imprint: Imprint-Button. Displays link to the imprint
